game.name: Death Soul
game.description:
Gear up to become the part of the highly addictive and most challenging adventure world! This time we are going to take you to a very exciting and thrilling world where your quick reflexes and awesome concentration can help make your way towards the victory. Are you strong enough to accept this unique challenge and show off the world that you can handle any dangerous character? Join Death Soul game and get ready to help your character spot the key of the exit door!

In this brand new adventure challenge, you can move and make your character jump to complete the mission. Each level comes with extra difficulties and challenges that would be bigger than the ones you faced off in the previous ones. The best part is that you would have several lives to lose. Try to achieve the mission before losing all your lives in this html5 escaping game! When you click the play button, you would see your character along with several dangerous traps. 

No need to have a fear of dying as some dead souls will also help you to move further and reach to the key! Take your time and try to make your character jump when it is actually needed! You can play this cute mobile phone game on PCs, tablets, windows phones, android phones and iPads or iPhones. After playing it for several minutes, you will automatically add it to your favorities. Good luck to browse through our huge collection of brain stimulating and platformer games for boys that are free to play online, no download required!
